pages.text: The $(mob)Mimic$() is a monster that spawns deep underground $(thing)Overworld$(). It appears as a normal $(item)Chest$() when at rest. When approached by a player or struck with a weapon, it will transform from a $(item)Chest$() into a hostile $(mob)Mimic$(), attacking nearby players. It can steal and consume items from a player's inventory to heal 20% of its health. Items stolen this way are destroyed and cannot be recovered. It afflicts players within 4 blocks of itself with a $(thing)Hunger$() effect. It is vulnerable to Fire.

$(mob)Mimics$() drop $(item)Monster Feed$() on death. This item can be used to tame any helper mobs from $(thing)Grimoire of Gaia$(). When tamed, they will behave like a vanilla $(l:minecraft_iron_golem)$(mob)Golem$().

$(mob)Mimics$() drop $(item)Book of Hunger$() on death, which inflicts $(thing)Hunger on foes upon a melee strike. Additionally,  $(mob)Mimics$() may drop any item which a basic $(thing)Minecraft$() creature could drop on death.
